44 
49 #include "Teuchos_ConfigDefs.hpp"
50 
51 
52 namespace Teuchos {
53 
54 
55 template <typename T>
56 struct UndefinedScalarTraits
57 {
59  static inline T notDefined() { return T::this_type_is_missing_a_specialization(); }
60 };
61 
62 
63 /* This is the default structure used by ScalarTraits<T> to produce a compile time
64  error when the specialization does not exist for type <tt>T</tt>.
65 */
66 
67 
88 template <typename T>
89 struct ScalarTraits
90 {
92  typedef T magnitudeType;
94  typedef T halfPrecision;
96  typedef T doublePrecision;
98  static const bool isComplex = false;
100  static const bool isOrdinal = false;
102  static const bool isComparable = false;
107  static const bool hasMachineParameters = false;
109  static inline magnitudeType eps() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
111  static inline magnitudeType sfmin() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
113  static inline magnitudeType base() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
115  static inline magnitudeType prec() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
117  static inline magnitudeType t() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
119  static inline magnitudeType rnd() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
121  static inline magnitudeType emin() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
123  static inline magnitudeType rmin() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
125  static inline magnitudeType emax() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
127  static inline magnitudeType rmax() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
129  static inline magnitudeType magnitude(T a) { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
131  static inline T zero() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
133  static inline T one() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
135  static inline magnitudeType real(T a) { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
137  static inline magnitudeType imag(T a) { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
139  static inline T conjugate(T a) { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
141  static inline T nan() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
143  static inline bool isnaninf(const T& x) { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
145  static inline void seedrandom(unsigned int s) { int i; T t = &i; }
147  static inline T random() { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
149  static inline std::string name() { (void)UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); return 0; }
151  static inline T squareroot(T x) { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
153  static inline T pow(T x, T y) { return UndefinedScalarTraits<T>::notDefined(); }
154 };
155 
156 
157 } // Teuchos namespace
